name: helios (itch) (glasm)
description:
"Helios is a puzzle game about the relationship of light & shadow"

• the goal of the game is to compose a picture using lights and shadows
• accuracy is not important - it's just your creativity
• the sample is located at the top right, there you can also select other examples
• the central column contains the layers of the image: background, light and silhouettes
• some elements can be moved and resized in the composed image on the left
• the list of elements in layers depends on the selected example

for jam: https://itch.io/jam/a-game-by-its-cover-2020
